name: Rainy Robot Rob
description:
A sweet and short game about the robot Rob trying to find their creator in a world where nobody else loves him. > Features <
  • Bossfight
  • 2 Worlds
  • Intro and Outro Animation
  • 3 Achievements
  • some Tears <3
> The Setting <

The robot Rob was created by a scientist and lived with her for his entire life, one day Rob had to leave her and got lost in the world of robot hating slums and the advanced city.

One day you someone tried to kill Rob and broke a piece of their head, now Rob has to protect their head from the rain or else they shut down.

Now you play Rob, travelling through all those dark places trying to find your creator, protecting yourself from the rain and survive the henchmen of Clearus.

> Controls <

Controller and Keyboard supported:
Controller: 

  • Left stick to move
  • South button to jump
  • East button to swap umbrella
  • North button to use taser

Keyboard:

  • A/D  or [<]/[>] to move
  • Space to jump
  • W or [^] to swap umbrella
  • S or [v] to use taser
